---
title: "Digital Projects"
---

### [Dangerous Press](https://dangerouspress.org)

The largest open archive of early 20th-century Black newspapers, containing over 15,000 issues from dozens of papers.

### [Dare You Fight: W.E.B Du Bois in *The Crisis*](https://dareyoufight.org)

A digital archive of W.E.B. Du Bois's writings from his 24-year tenure at *The Crisis*.

### [Crisis & Opportunity](https://www.crisisopportunity.org)

A repository of early 20th-century social science articles by African American scholars.

### [23 Fifth Avenue](https://23-fifth-avenue.pubpub.org)

A repository of pieces by early 20th-century reformers.

### [C&O Books](https://www.crisisopportunity.org/books/)

New transcriptions of public domain novels from the Harlem Renaissance.
